ComicInfo.Summary:
Brian Wood! Mack Chater!
On the run from the Forty Swords, Dag and Elsbeth fall back to the wilds of Northern Europe and shelter with a secretive group of mountain warriors. Elsbeth learns the history of the sword she carries, and we get a glimpse at the woman she's destined to become.
Brian Wood and Mack Chater team up again!
A premiere format: 28 story pages, deluxe cover.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Greg Smallwood | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Mack Chater | 2 |
